basics.name: Ram Subramanian
basics.label: Full-Stack Cloud & IoT Engineer | Node.js | TypeScript | React.js | Flutter | AWS | Azure | AI Orchestration
basics.summary: Full-Stack Cloud & IoT Engineer with 20 years of experience, specializing in AI orchestration and building scalable, high-performance systems. Proficient in Node.js, TypeScript, React.js, Flutter, AWS, and Azure. Strong advocate for code governance, reusable architecture, and translating complex business problems into clear, implementable solutions. Experienced in driving developer productivity, cloud-native architectures, and IoT solutions.

work.name: Worksafe Victoria
work.summary: Champion in serverless API development and SaaS integration. Expert in stateless execution and immutable data engineering. Built scalable, high-performance, economical, and secure cloud infrastructure.
highlights: Champion in serverless API development and SaaS integration
Expert in stateless execution and immutable data engineering
Built scalable, high-performance, economical, and secure cloud infrastructure
Specialized in async and sync event-driven solution architecture and decoupling microservices
Set up boilerplates, frameworks, and scoped components
Designed, implemented, and maintained high-performing server-side applications using Node.js and NoSQL/SQL databases
Visualized, designed, developed and monitored processes to run at scale
Broke down business processes into deliverable technical components for front-end and back-end squads
Rapid technical proof-of-concepts using polyglot development (NodeJS & ReactJS) and cloud (AWS & Azure)
Implemented PaaS / FaaS development using best practices
Proficient in designing and developing RESTful and GraphQL APIs
Designed and developed data storage solutions using databases and caching
Integrated front-end elements with server-side logic and APIs
Wrote reusable, testable, and efficient code following best practices
Debugged and fixed bugs, improved system performance, and responded to feature requests
Broke down monolith into microservices
Enabled cloud and migrated on-prem applications
Conducted thorough code reviews
Developed bots for housekeeping operations, resulting in significant cost savings
Delivered auto-healing solutions
Implemented Mobile DevOps to AppStore and Playstore
Implemented automated testing platforms and unit tests to ensure code quality

work.name: UnitedHealth Group
work.summary: Developed and optimized server-side logic. Worked with RESTful APIs and various Node.js frameworks. Specialized in the integration of APIs (FinTech & HIPAA).
work.location: New Jersey, USA & New Delhi, India
highlights: Developed and optimized server-side logic
Worked with RESTful APIs and various Node.js frameworks
Demonstrated analytical skills, problem-solving abilities, and a commitment to delivering efficient, scalable software solutions
Developed various microservices in Node.js
Specialized in the integration of APIs (FinTech & HIPAA)
Developed bots for housekeeping operations, resulting in significant cost savings
Created event-driven microservices using Node.js and NoSQL/SQL databases
Automated morning checks using WebDriverJS & Splunk
Designed and implemented Single Sign-On for partners

work.name: Radicle Inc.
work.summary: Prepared design documents and coded per requirements in J2EE. Designed and developed scalable server-side applications using Java.
highlights: Prepared design documents and coded per requirements in J2EE
Designed and developed scalable server-side applications using Java
Integrated authentication module using LDAP
Developed robust and scalable server-side applications using Java
Leveraged frameworks like Spring Boot for rapid development and increased efficiency
Identified and resolved application performance bottlenecks

Automated the detection and alerting of problems in logs using Splunk and developed dashboards
